We who are autoimmune thyroid are more susceptible to other autoimmune conditions than the normal non-autoimmune population. Doesn't necessarily mean we will get any of the autoimmune condition, even if they might run in the family, it just means we have more of a chance.  The best we can do is to live a happy, stress free as possible and healthy nutritional life style, to build and keep a healthy  immune system, and to keep our weight in tack.Good luck to the both of you.
